verses.verse: <S%H559>Say<s%> you unto your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, <S%H5971>Ammi<s%>; and to your <S%H269>sisters<s%>, <S%H7355>Ru<s%>â€“hamah.

<S%H7378>Plead<s%> with your <S%H517>mother<s%>, <S%H7378>plead<s%>: for she is not my <S%H802>wife<s%>, neither am I her <S%H376>husband<s%>: let her therefore put <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> out of her <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and her <S%H5005>adulteries<s%> from between her <S%H7699>breasts<s%>;

Lest I <S%H6584>strip<s%> her <S%H6174>naked<s%>, and <S%H3322>set<s%> her as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that she was <S%H3205>born<s%>, and <S%H7760>make<s%> her as a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H7896>set<s%> her like a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H4191>kill<s%> her with <S%H6772>thirst<s%>.
And I will not have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon her <S%H1121>sons<s%>; for they be the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%>.

For their <S%H517>mother<s%> has played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>: she that <S%H2029>conceived<s%> them has done <S%H3001>shamefully<s%>: for she <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H157>lovers<s%>, that <S%H5414>give<s%> me my <S%H3899>bread<s%> and my <S%H4325>water<s%>, my <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax<s%>, my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H8250>drink<s%>.
<S%H7753>Therefore<s%>, behold, I will hedge up your <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H5518>thorns<s%>, and <S%H1443>make<s%> a <S%H1447>wall<s%>, that she shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> her <S%H5410>paths<s%>.

And she shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> after her <S%H157>lovers<s%>, but she shall not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H1245>them<s%>; and she shall seek <S%H4672>them<s%>, but shall not find <S%H559>them<s%>: then shall she say, I will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%>; for then was it <S%H2896>better<s%> with me than <S%H6258>now<s%>.

For she did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> her <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, which they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.

Therefore will I <S%H7725>return<s%>, and take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1715>corn<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H8492>there<s%>, and my wine in the <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H5337>there<s%>, and will recover my <S%H6785>wool<s%> and my <S%H6593>flax<s%> given to <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.
And now will I <S%H1540>discover<s%> her <S%H5040>lewdness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and <S%H376>none<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> her out of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
I will also cause all her <S%H4885>mirth<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, her feast <S%H2282>days<s%>, her new <S%H2320>moons<s%>, and her <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and all her solemn <S%H4150>feasts<s%>.

And I will <S%H8074>destroy<s%> her <S%H1612>vines<s%> and her fig <S%H8384>trees<s%>, whereof she has <S%H559>said<s%>, These are my <S%H866>rewards<s%> that my <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H7760>me<s%>: and I will make them a <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall eat <S%H398>them<s%>.

And I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> upon her the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, where she burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H5710>them<s%>, and she decked herself with her <S%H5141>earrings<s%> and her <S%H2484>jewels<s%>, and she <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H6601>Therefore<s%>, behold, I will allure <S%H3212>her<s%>, and bring her into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> comfortably unto <S%H3820>her<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her her <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> from <S%H6010>there<s%>, and the valley of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> for a <S%H6607>door<s%> of <S%H8615>hope<s%>: and she shall <S%H6030>sing<s%> <S%H3117>there<s%>, as in the days of her <S%H5271>youth<s%>, and as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And it shall be at that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> me <S%H376>Ishi<s%>; and shall <S%H7121>call<s%> me no more <S%H1180>Baali<s%>.
For I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> out of her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and they shall no more be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> by their <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for them with the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and with the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and with the creeping <S%H7431>things<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>: and I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and will make them to lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>.

And I will <S%H781>betroth<s%> you unto me for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; <S%H781>Yes<s%>, I will betroth you unto me in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, and in <S%H7356>mercies<s%>.
I will even <S%H781>betroth<s%> you unto me in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%>: and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, I will <S%H6030>hear<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I will <S%H6030>hear<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and they shall <S%H6030>hear<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>;
And the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H6030>hear<s%> the <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and the <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and the <S%H3323>oil<s%>; and they shall <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

And I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> her unto me in the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and I will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon her that had not obtained <S%H7355>mercy<s%>; and I will <S%H559>say<s%> to them which were not my <S%H5971>people<s%>, You are my <S%H5971>people<s%>; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, You are my <S%H430>God<s%>.
